intro.description: We recommend using the Samples Project (installed with GUIdancer) to do this cheat sheet.

item.title: Import the Samples Projects
item.description:
If you have not already done so, import the Samples Projects.
Select Project > Import.
If you have not already logged into the database, do so when prompted.
In the import dialog browse to:
guidancer/examples/projects
Select Samples.xml and bound_modules_samples.xml and import them into the database.

item.title: Open the Samples Project
item.description: Select: Project > Open and choose to open the Samples Project.
